hero.title: Sara Gavilán: Junior Web Developer
hero.subtitle: Code, Data, and Creativity. I use technology to drive sustainability and social progress.

about.title: From Curiosity to Code.
about.text: I’m currently participating in the development of a React Native application and continuing my education in Data Analysis and Development + AI. My profile is versatile: I’m ready to bring a technical and analytical vision to purpose-driven projects.

stack.title: Stack I Practice With: React, Node, SQL and R

contact.title: Let’s Talk.
contact.text: I’m open to collaborations and new opportunities that align technology with a positive purpose.
